name: Honey Honey Ballon
description:
Description:

this game is about a ballon escorting a honey blob through a endless dangers, spikes that could end the  ballon and bacteria that will rotten the honey if touched. 

Controles:
moving : hold left click and move the mouse 

shortning the link : mouse scroll wheel

Crediting:

- tilemap : made by Pixel Frog

pst: leaderboard is accesible from the pause menu

and sorry there is no mouse sensitivity options also i recommend downloading the windows version its more stable "less  buggy" and leaderboards work there
